tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodiversity_info (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ecosystem_name TEXT,
  species_name TEXT,
  population_size INT,
  threat_level TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE impact_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    impact_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ecosystem_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ecosystem_name VARCHAR(255),
    region VARCHAR(100),
    habitat_type VARCHAR(50),
    biodiversity_index INT
);

CREATE TABLE activity_impact_mapping (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    ecosystem_id INT,
    impact_level VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_activity FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES impact_activities(id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_ecosystem FOREIGN KEY (ecosystem_id) REFERENCES ecosystem_information(id)
);

CREATE TABLE impact_on_ecosystems (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR,
  ecosystem_type VARCHAR,
  impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE biodiversity_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR,
  population_size INT,
  habitat_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE industrial_activities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR,
  industry_type VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ecosystem_health (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ecosystem_type VARCHAR,
  health_status VARCHAR,
  pollution_level VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE biodiversity_researchers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR,
  specialization VARCHAR,
  contact_email VARCHAR
)
